channel.title: Prayer Hover Interfaces - (requested to ask here)
channel.description:
Well, hello everyone. I am new to the MoparScape world, and I've a few days of Java under my belt. There's a lot of things dealing with Java that I just can't seem to figure out.
Well, back on topic.
I am using the Natural Born Killers base, which to me, is a pretty nice base. The files are neat, the code lines are neat. And, all in all, it's a good base, to me. But, if you think otherwise, let me know.
Okay, well - strayed off topic again, sorry..
Now-
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uc1qzQnjCIQ]The video is here.[/url]
Those hover-over interfaces, I want to add them into my server, and whenever you hover over the prayer it will show what it shows above. Once I find out how to do that, I, on my own, do the same thing for the new prayers. (Turmoil, Wrath, Soul Split, etc.)
Well, I know you have to have the interface itself for each prayer, which I am currently PhotoShopping.
As of now, whenever you hover over the prayer, in the top left corner of the game-screen it says.. "Activate Incredible Reflexes, 5620" (for every prayer, this is a mere example.) Well, I want to get rid of the comma and the number, how would I go about doing that?
Well, I would appreciate it if you would only give me hints on what to do, because I wish to learn how to do FULLY do this on my own later on in the future.
Thank you.

item.title: Prayer Hover Interfaces - (requested to ask here)
item.dc:creator: @Zetabyte Zetabyte™
item.description:
@Zetabyte wrote:

Well, hello everyone. I am new to the MoparScape world, and I’ve a few days of Java under my belt.
There’s a lot of things dealing with Java that I just can’t seem to figure out.

Well, back on topic.

I am using the Natural Born Killers base, which to me, is a pretty nice base. The files are neat, the code lines are neat. And, all in all, it’s a good base, to me. But, if you think otherwise, let me know.

Okay, well - strayed off topic again, sorry…

Now-

The video is here.

Those hover-over interfaces, I want to add them into my server, and whenever you hover over the prayer it will show what it shows above. Once I find out how to do that, I, on my own, do the same thing for the new prayers. (Turmoil, Wrath, Soul Split, etc.)

Well, I know you have to have the interface itself for each prayer, which I am currently PhotoShopping.

As of now, whenever you hover over the prayer, in the top left corner of the game-screen it says…
“Activate Incredible Reflexes, 5620” (for every prayer, this is a mere example.)
Well, I want to get rid of the comma and the number, how would I go about doing that?

Well, I would appreciate it if you would only give me hints on what to do, because I wish to learn how to do FULLY do this on my own later on in the future.

Thank you.

Read full topic
